alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:07PM CDT until March 27 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Water begins to cover several streets and roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 28.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.5 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 28.5 Thu 8 pm CDT 28.7 25.8 22.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CDT.
